properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Cape Charles Light to Virginia-North Carolina border out to 20 nm; Coastal waters from Parramore Island to Cape Charles Light VA out 20 nm; Coastal waters from NC VA border to Currituck Beach Light NC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 8 at 3:10PM EST until January 8 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt. Winds may
occasionally gust to 35 kts late this afternoon, especially out
20 nm. Seas 3 to 5 feet.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Parramore Island to Cape Charles
Light VA out 20 nm, Coastal Waters from Cape Charles Light to
Virginia-North Carolina border out to 20 nm and Coastal waters
from NC VA border to Currituck Beach Light NC out 20 nm.

* WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
